task_intent.title: 005-add-image-stats-diagnostic-endpoint
task_intent.description: Create a _calculate_image_stats function and expose it as a standalone API endpoint that returns brightness, contrast, dynamic range, color balance, and saturation metrics without requiring preprocessing. This helps users diagnose image quality issues before extraction.
